bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Walker et al. Memo from the Sheriff
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: Sheriff Office 1604 1/2 County of Pierce W.T. } ss.

I do hereby return to the honorable. Jude of the District Court of the Second Judicial District of the Territory of Washington that before the coming to me of the and hereinto annexed writ, the said M.A. Walker was committed to my custody, and is detained by virtue of a commitment, a copy of which is hereto annexed, the original of which I also herewith produce; nevertheless, I have the body of the said M.A. Walker before you at the time and place within mentioned, as I am within commanded--
Dated Tacoma W.T. Lewis Byrd August 31st 1885 Sheriff of Pierce County W.T.
